section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.8 Released
section.p: Feb 28th 2012- DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.8 ("Newton") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 3.0.8 includes the following changes over 3.0.7

ul.li: Fix to cascade-attach of arrays of persistable types
Fix to classloader usage for "persistence.xml" to work with OSGi
Minor change to OSGi metadata load (Danny van Leiden)
RDBMS : Support for sequences with Derby 10.6+ (Michael Bouschen)
RDBMS : Fix to BLOB/CLOB with non-standard Oracle JDBC driver (Ludovic Galibert)

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
